pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, December 6, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Newfoundland and Labrador, Andrew Furey.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

Montréal, Quebec

Private meetings

5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a vigil in memory of the victims of the 1989 École Polytechnique Montréal tragedy.
